name: Pijani Ivan
description:
CONTROLS:
- WASD or Arrow Keys for moving around
- Shift for sprinting
- Left Mouse for shotting
- Right Mouse for throwing molotovs
- ESC to return to the Main Menu

LORE:

In this, you are put in shoes of Russian guy name Ivan. Same as a majority of Russians one day Ivan gets drunk and ends up in a cave in the middle of the Siberia. 

As he wakes up with a hangover he realises that he has only two items with him. These are his rifle and bottle of Vodka. He desperately wants to go back to his wife Anastasia and his four kids.

Thing he has with him

But there one minor obstacle in his way. The cave is filled up with bears and he has no flashlight. So only way to get out is to SHOOT and THROW molotovs.

Bears that chase him
